ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS

block.text: PAULUN QALATİYALILARA MӘKTUBU

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS CHP 1
Paul, an apostle (not from men, neither through man, but through Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead),

block.text: Nә insanlardan, nә dә insan vasitәsilә, ancaq İsa Mәsih vә Onu ölülәr arasından dirildәn Ata Allah vasitәsilә hәvari tәyin olunan mәn Pauldan

ReferenceBlocks.text: and all the brothers who are with me, to the assemblies of Galatia:

block.text: vә mәnimlә olan bütün qardaşlardan Qalatiyada olan imanlı cәmiyyәtlәrә salam!

ReferenceBlocks.text: Grace to you and peace from God the Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ,

block.text: Atamız Allahdan vә Rәbb İsa Mәsihdәn sizә lütf vә sülh olsun!

ReferenceBlocks.text: who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us out of this present evil age, according to the will of our God and Father--

block.text: Atamız Allahın iradәsinә görә Mәsih günahlarımız üçün Özünü fәda etdi ki, bizi indiki şәr dövründәn qurtarsın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.

block.text: Allaha әbәdi izzәt olsun! Amin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I marvel that you are so quickly deserting him who called you in the grace of Christ to a different “good news”.

block.text: Heyrәtlәnirәm ki, Mәsihin lütfü ilә sizi çağıran Allahı belә tezliklә tәrk edib başqa bir müjdәyә tәrәf dönürsünüz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There isn't another “good news.” Only there are some who trouble you, and want to pervert the Good News of Christ.

block.text: Әslindә başqa müjdә yoxdur. Ancaq sizi lәrzәyә salıb Mәsihin Müjdәsini tәhrif etmәk istәyәnlәr vardır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But even though we, or an angel from heaven, should preach to you any “good news” other than that which we preached to you, let him be cursed.

block.text: Amma istәr biz, istәrsә göydәn gәlәn bir mәlәk belә, bizim sizә yaydığımız Müjdәyә zidd bir şeyi müjdә kimi yaysa, ona lәnәt olsun!

ReferenceBlocks.text: As we have said before, so I now say again: if any man preaches to you any “good news” other than that which you received, let him be cursed.

block.text: Әvvәlcә dediyimizi indi bir daha deyirәm: kim sizә qәbul etdiyiniz Müjdәyә zidd bir şey yayırsa, ona lәnәt olsun!

ReferenceBlocks.text: For am I now seeking the favor of men, or of God? Or am I striving to please men? For if I were still pleasing men, I wouldn't be a servant of Christ.

block.text: İndi mәn insanları, yoxsa Allahı mәmnun etmәyi axtarıram? Yoxsa insanlarımı razı salmağa çalışıram? Әgәr mәn hәlә dә insanları razı salmaq istәsәydim, Mәsihin qulu olmazdım.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I make known to you, brothers, concerning the Good News which was preached by me, that it is not according to man.

block.text: Qardaşlar, sizә bәyan edirәm ki, mәnim yaydığım Müjdәnin mәnbәyi insan deyil.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For neither did I receive it from man, nor was I taught it, but it came to me through revelation of Jesus Christ.

block.text: Çünki mәn onu insandan almadım vә insan tәrәfindәn dә öyrәdilmәdim. Bunu mәnә İsa Mәsih vәhy vasitәsilә açdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you have heard of my way of living in time past in the Jews’ religion. How that beyond measure I persecuted the assembly of God, and ravaged it.

block.text: Yәhudi dininә bağlı olduğum günlәrdә mәnim necә hәyat sürdüyümü eşitdiniz. Mәn Allahın cәmiyyәtini hәdsiz tәqib edir, onu dağıdırdım.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I advanced in the Jews’ religion beyond many of my own age among my countrymen, being more exceedingly zealous for the traditions of my fathers.

block.text: Yәhudi dinindә soydaşlarım arasında yaşıdlarımın bir çoxundan daha irәlidә idim. Ata-babalarımın adәt-әnәnәlәrinin qeyrәtini hәddindәn artıq çәkirdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when it was the good pleasure of God, who separated me from my mother's womb, and called me through his grace,

block.text: Amma hәlә anamın bәtnindәn mәni seçib lütfü ilә çağıran Allah

ReferenceBlocks.text: to reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the Gentiles, I didn't immediately confer with flesh and blood,

block.text: Öz Oğlu ilә bağlı Müjdәni başqa millәtlәr arasında yayım deyә Onu mәnә zahir etmәyә razı olanda dәrhal insanlarla mәslәhәtlәşmәdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: nor did I go up to Jerusalem to those who were apostles before me, but I went away into Arabia. Then I returned to Damascus.

block.text: Yerusәlimә, mәndәn qabaq hәvari olanların yanına da getmәdim, amma Әrәbistana getdim, sonra yenә Dәmәşqә qayıtdım.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to visit Peter, and stayed with him fifteen days.

block.text: Üç il keçәndәn sonra isә Kefa ilә tanış olmaq üçün Yerusәlimә getdim vә on beş gün onun yanında qaldım.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But of the other apostles I saw no one, except James, the Lord's brother.

block.text: O biri hәvarilәrin heç birini görmәdim. Ancaq Rәbbin qardaşı Yaqubu gördüm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I assure you before God that what I am writing to you is no lie.

block.text: Allahın önündә sizә yazdıqlarımın yalan olmadığını deyirәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then I came to the regions of Syria and Cilicia.

block.text: Sonra Suriya vә Kilikiya diyarlarına getdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was still unknown by face to the assemblies of Judea which were in Christ.

block.text: Yәhudeyanın Mәsihdә olan cәmiyyәtlәri isә mәni şәxsәn tanımırdılar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They only heard: “He who once persecuted us now preaches the faith that he once tried to destroy.”

block.text: Yalnız bu sözü eşidirdilәr: <<Bir zaman bizi tәqib edәn şәxs vaxtilә yox etmәyә çalışdığı imanı müjdәlәyir>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And they glorified God in me.

block.text: Belәliklә, mәnә görә Allahı izzәtlәndirirdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS CHP 2
Then after a period of fourteen years I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas, taking Titus also with me.

block.text: On dörd il keçәndәn sonra isә Barnaba ilә birlikdә Titi dә özümlә götürüb yenә Yerusәlimә getdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I went up by revelation, and I laid before them the Good News which I preach among the Gentiles. And privately before those who were respected, for fear that I might be running, or had run, in vain.

block.text: Vәhy vasitәsilә getdim. Başqa millәtlәr arasında vәz etdiyim Müjdәni onlara, etibarlı olanlara şәxsәn tәqdim etdim ki, boş yerә cәhd etmәyim vә yaxud da cәhd etmiş olmayım.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But not even Titus, who was with me, being a Greek, was compelled to be circumcised.

block.text: Yanımda olan Tit dә Yunan olduğu halda sünnәt olunmağa mәcbur edilmәdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This was because of the false brothers secretly brought in. They stole in to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage.

block.text: Bu iş aramıza gizlicә soxulan yalançı qardaşlar üzündәn oldu. Onlar Mәsih İsada malik olduğumuz azadlığı әl altından öyrәnib bizi kölә etmәk üçün gizlicә aramıza girdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We gave no place in the way of subjection, not for an hour, that the truth of the Good News might continue with you.

block.text: Onlara bir anlıq da olsa, baş әyib tәslim olmadıq ki, Müjdәnin hәqiqәti sizinlә qalsın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But from those who were reputed to be important (whatever they were, it makes no difference to me; God doesn't show partiality to man)-- they, I say, who were respected imparted nothing to me,

block.text: Etibarlı sayılan şәxslәrә gәlincә, kim olursa olsun mәnә vacib deyil, Allah insanlara tәrәfkeşlik etmәz. Lakin bu etibarlı sayılan şәxslәr mәnim dediklәrimә heç nә artırmadılar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but to the contrary, when they saw that I had been entrusted with the Good News for the uncircumcision, even as Peter with the Good News for the circumcision

block.text: Әksinә, sünnәtlilәrә Müjdә yaymaq işi Peterә tapşırıldığı kimi sünnәtsizlәr arasında Müjdә yaymaq işinin mәnә tapşırıldığını gördülәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: (for he who appointed Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision appointed me also to the Gentiles);

block.text: Çünki sünnәtlilәrә hәvari olması üçün Peterdә fәal olan Allah başqa millәtlәr üçün mәndә dә fәal oldu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and when they perceived the grace that was given to me, James and Cephas and John, they who were reputed to be pillars, gave to me and Barnabas the right hand of fellowship, that we should go to the Gentiles, and they to the circumcision.

block.text: Cәmiyyәtin sütunları sayılan Yaqub, Kefa vә Yәhya mәnә bağışlanan lütfü tanıdıqda mәnә vә Barnabaya sağ әllәrini uzatdılar ki, şәrikliyimiz olsun. Ona görә ki biz başqa millәtlәrin, onlarsa sünnәtlilәrin yanına getsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They only asked us to remember the poor--which very thing I was also zealous to do.

block.text: Yalnız yoxsulları yad etmәyimizi istәdilәr, mәn dә mәhz bunu icra etmәyә sәy göstәrdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when Peter came to Antioch, I resisted him to his face, because he stood condemned.

block.text: Kefa Antakyaya gәldikdә isә şәxsәn ona qarşı çıxdım, ona görә ki tәnqidә layiq idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For before some people came from James, he ate with the Gentiles. But when they came, he drew back and separated himself, fearing those who were of the circumcision.

block.text: Çünki Yaqubun yanından bәzi adamlar gәlmәmişdәn әvvәl Peter başqa millәtlәrdәn olanlarla yemәk yeyirdi. Hәmin adamlar gәldikdә isә sünnәt tәrәfdarlarından qorxaraq başqa millәtlәrin yanından çәkilib ayrı durdu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And the rest of the Jews joined him in his hypocrisy; so that even Barnabas was carried away with their hypocrisy.

block.text: Onunla birlikdә o biri Yәhudilәr dә ikiüzlülük etdilәr. Hәtta Barnaba belә, onların ikiüzlülüyünә qapıldı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when I saw that they didn't walk uprightly according to the truth of the Good News, I said to Peter before them all, “If you, being a Jew, live as the Gentiles do, and not as the Jews do, why do you compel the Gentiles to live as the Jews do?”

block.text: Amma mәn Müjdәnin hәqiqәtinә görә düzgün riayәt etmәdiklәrini görәndә hamının qarşısında Kefaya dedim: <<Әgәr sәn Yәhudi olduğun halda Yәhudi kimi deyil, başqa millәtlәrdәn biri kimi yaşayırsansa, necә başqa millәtlәri Yәhudi kimi yaşamağa mәcbur edirsәn?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We were born Jews by nature, and not Gentile sinners.

block.text: Biz anadangәlmә Yәhudilәrik, başqa millәtdәn olan <<günahkarlar>> deyilik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so, we know that a man is not justified by the works of the law but through faith in Jesus Christ. Even we believed in Christ Jesus, that we might be justified by faith in Christ, and not by the works of the law. No flesh will be justified by the works of the law.

block.text: Lakin biz bilirik ki, insan Qanuna әmәl etmәklә deyil, yalnız İsa Mәsihә iman etmәklә saleh sayılır. Biz dә Mәsih İsaya iman etdik ki, Qanuna әmәl etmәklә deyil, Mәsihә olan imanla saleh sayılaq. Çünki Qanuna әmәl etmәklә heç bir insan saleh sayılmaz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if, while we sought to be justified in Christ, we ourselves also were found sinners, is Christ a servant of sin? Certainly not!

block.text: Әgәr biz Mәsihdә saleh sayılmaq istәrkәn özümüz günahkar çıxsaq, belә çıxır ki, Mәsih günah xidmәtçisidir? Әsla!

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if I build up again those things which I destroyed, I prove myself a law-breaker.

block.text: Әgәr mәn әvvәlcә yıxdığımı yenidәn tikirәmsә, özümü Qanunu pozan olaraq göstәrirәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I, through the law, died to the law, that I might live to God.

block.text: Çünki mәn Qanun vasitәsilә Qanuna münasibәtdә öldüm ki, Allah üçün yaşayım.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have been crucified with Christ, and it is no longer I that live, but Christ living in me. That life which I now live in the flesh, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself up for me.

block.text: Mәsihlә birlikdә çarmıxa çәkildim. Artıq mәn yaşamıram, Mәsih mәndә yaşayır. İndi cismәn yaşadığım hәyata gәlincә mәni sevib uğrumda Özünü fәda edәn Allahın Oğluna olan imanla yaşayıram.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I don't make void the grace of God. For if righteousness is through the law, then Christ died for nothing!”

block.text: Allahın lütfünü rәdd etmirәm. Çünki әgәr salehlik Qanun vasitәsilә qazanıla bilsәydi, demәli Mәsih boş yerә öldü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS CHP 3
Foolish Galatians, who has bewitched you not to obey the truth, before whose eyes Jesus Christ was openly set forth among you as crucified?

block.text: Ey ağılsız Qalatiyalılar! Sizi kim tilsimlәdi? İsa Mәsihin çarmıxa çәkilmәsi gözlәriniz önündә açıqca tәsvir olundu!

ReferenceBlocks.text: I just want to learn this from you. Did you receive the Spirit by the works of the law, or by hearing of faith?

block.text: Sizdәn yalnız bunu öyrәnmәk istәyirәm: Ruhu Qanuna әmәl etmәklә, yoxsa eşitdiyinizә iman etmәklә aldınız?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Are you so foolish? Having begun in the Spirit, are you now completed in the flesh?

block.text: Siz bu qәdәrmi ağılsızsınız? Ruhla başlayandan sonra indi cismani sәylәmi bitirirsiniz?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Did you suffer so many things in vain, if it is indeed in vain?

block.text: Boş yerәmi o qәdәr әzab çәkdiniz? Hәqiqәtәn, bunlar boş yerә idi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: He therefore who supplies the Spirit to you, and works miracles among you, does he do it by the works of the law, or by hearing of faith?

block.text: Bәs sizi Ruhla tәmin edәn vә aranızda möcüzәlәr yaradan Allah bunları Qanuna әmәl etmәyinizlә, yoxsa eşitdiyinizә iman etmәyinizlә icra edir?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as Abraham

block.text: Mәsәlәn,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “believed God, and it was counted to him for righteousness.”

block.text: <<İbrahim Allaha iman etdi vә bu ona salehlik sayıldı>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Know therefore that those who are of faith, the same are children of Abraham.

block.text: İndi isә bunu bilin ki, İbrahimin övladları imana әsaslananlar olur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith, preached the Good News beforehand to Abraham, saying,

block.text: Müqәddәs Yazı Allahın başqa millәtlәri imanları ilә saleh sayacağını qabaqcadan görüb İbrahimә deyәrәk Müjdәni qabaqcadan bildirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “In you all the nations will be blessed.”

block.text: <<bütün millәtlәr sәnin vasitәnlә xeyir-dua alacaq>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, those who are of faith are blessed with the faithful Abraham.

block.text: Belәliklә, imana әsaslananlar iman etmiş olan İbrahimlә birlikdә xeyir-dua alırlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under a curse. For it is written,

block.text: Qanuna әmәl etmәyә әsaslananların hamısı lәnәt altındadır. Çünki yazılıb:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Cursed is everyone who doesn't continue in all things that are written in the book of the law, to do them.”

block.text: <<Qoy Qanun kitabında yazılan hәr şeyә riayәt etmәyәn, onu tәsdiq etmәyәn hәr kәsә lәnәt olsun!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now that no man is justified by the law before God is evident, for,

block.text: Aydındır ki, Allah qarşısında heç kim Qanun vasitәsilә saleh sayılmır, çünki

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The righteous will live by faith.”

block.text: <<saleh adam imanla yaşayacaq>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The law is not of faith, but,

block.text: Qanun isә imana әsaslanmamışdır. Әksinә,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The man who does them will live by them.”

block.text: <<bu şeylәri yerinә yetirәn adam bunların sayәsindә yaşayacaq>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law, having become a curse for us. For it is written,

block.text: Mәsih bizim uğrumuzda lәnәtlәnәrәk bizi Qanunun lәnәtindәn satın aldı. Çünki yazılıb:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree,”

block.text: <<ağacdan asılan hәr kәsә lәnәt olsun!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: that the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Christ Jesus; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.

block.text: Belә ki İbrahimin aldığı xeyir-dua Mәsih İsada bütün başqa millәtlәrin üzәrinә gәlsin vә biz vәd edilmiş Ruhu iman vasitәsilә alaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Brothers, speaking of human terms, though it is only a man's covenant, yet when it has been confirmed, no one makes it void, or adds to it.

block.text: Qardaşlar, insan düşüncәsi әsasında deyirәm: hәtta insanın belә tәsdiq etdiyi әhdi heç kәs lәğv edә bilmәz yaxud da ona heç bir şey әlavә edә bilmәz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the promises were spoken to Abraham and to his seed. He doesn't say, “To seeds,” as of many, but as of one, “To your seed,” which is Christ.

block.text: Vәdlәr ancaq İbrahimә vә onun nәslinә verildi. Allah çox adam barәdә danışırmış kimi <<vә nәslindәn olanlara>> yox, tәk bir adam barәdә danışaraq <<vә sәnin nәslindәn olana>> deyir; bu <<nәslindәn olan>> Mәsihdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I say this. A covenant confirmed beforehand by God in Christ. The law, which came four hundred thirty years after, does not annul, so as to make the promise of no effect.

block.text: Bunu demәk istәyirәm: Allahın tәsdiq etdiyi Әhdi bundan dörd yüz otuz il sonra gәlәn Qanun qüvvәdәn sala bilmәz ki, vәdi lәğv etsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if the inheritance is of the law, it is no more of promise; but God has granted it to Abraham by promise.

block.text: Çünki әgәr irs Qanuna әsaslanırsa, artıq vәdә әsaslanmır. Amma Allah İbrahimә irsi vәd vasitәsilә lütfә görә verdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What then is the law? It was added because of transgressions. Until the seed should come to whom the promise has been made. It was ordained through angels by the hand of a mediator.

block.text: Bәs Qanun nә üçündür? Qanun Әhdi pozanları tәqsirlәndirmәk üçün әlavә olundu. Vәdi alan vә İbrahimin nәslindәn olan Şәxs gәlәnә qәdәr qüvvәdә qalmalı idi. Mәlәklәr vasitәsilә, bir vasitәçi әli ilә tәrtib edildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now a mediator is not between one, but God is one.

block.text: Vasitәçi tәk bir nәfәrә aid deyildir, Allah isә birdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Is the law then against the promises of God? Certainly not! For if there had been a law given which could make alive, most certainly righteousness would have been of the law.

block.text: Demәli, Qanun Allahın vәdlәrinә ziddirmi? Әsla! Çünki әgәr hәyat vermәyә qadir olan bir Qanun verilsәydi, salehlik, hәqiqәtәn, Qanunla gәlәrdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Scriptures imprisoned all things under sin, that the promise by faith in Jesus Christ might be given to those who believe.

block.text: Lakin Müqәddәs Yazı bütün kainatı günahın әsiri elan etdi ki, İsa Mәsihә olan imanla vәd olunan şeylәr iman edәnlәrә verilsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But before faith came, we were kept in custody under the law, confined for the faith which should afterwards be revealed.

block.text: Amma bu iman gәlmәzdәn qabaq biz Qanun altında saxlanmışdıq, gәlәcәk iman zühur edәnә qәdәr әsir tutulmuşduq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So that the law has become our tutor to bring us to Christ, that we might be justified by faith.

block.text: Yәni Qanun bizә Mәsihә qәdәr yol göstәrәn mürәbbimiz oldu ki, imanla saleh sayılaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now that faith has come, we are no longer under a tutor.

block.text: Amma iman gәldiyinә görә biz artıq mürәbbinin әli altında deyilik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you are all children of God, through faith in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Siz hamınız Mәsih İsaya olan iman vasitәsilә Allahın övladlarısınız.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as many of you as were baptized into Christ have put on Christ.

block.text: Çünki vәftizdә Mәsihlә birlәşәn hamınız Mәsihә bürünmüsünüz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither slave nor free man, there is neither male nor female; for you are all one in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Artıq Yәhudi ilә Yunan, qulla azad, kişi ilә qadın arasında fәrq yoxdur. Çünki hamınız Mәsih İsada birsiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you are Christ's, then you are Abraham's seed and heirs according to promise.

block.text: Әgәr Mәsihә aidsinizsә, demәli, İbrahimin nәslindәnsiniz vә vәdә görә varissiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS CHP 4
But I say that so long as the heir is a child, he is no different from a bondservant, though he is lord of all;

block.text: Mәn bunu deyirәm: varis hәr şeyin sahibi olsa da, uşaqlıq vaxtında kölәdәn fәrqlәnmir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but is under guardians and stewards until the day appointed by the father.

block.text: O, atasının tәyin etdiyi vaxta qәdәr qәyyumların vә idarәçilәrin nәzarәti altındadır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So we also, when we were children, were held in bondage under the elemental principles of the world.

block.text: Bunun kimi biz dә ruhani tәrәfdәn uşaq ikәn dünyanın ibtidai tәlimlәrinә kölә idik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when the fullness of the time came, God sent out his Son, born to a woman, born under the law,

block.text: Lakin vaxt tamam olanda Allah qadından, Qanun altında doğulan Öz Oğlunu göndәrdi ki,

ReferenceBlocks.text: that he might redeem those who were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of children.

block.text: Qanun altında olanları satın alsın vә biz övladlığa götürülәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And because you are children, God sent out the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, “Abba, Father!”

block.text: Övladlar olduğunuz üçün Allah Öz Oğlunun <<Abba, Ata!>> deyәrәk nida edәn Ruhunu ürәklәrimizә göndәrdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So you are no longer a bondservant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.

block.text: Buna görә dә sәn artıq kölә deyil, övladsan. Әgәr övladsansa, hәmçinin Allahın tәyin etdiyi varissәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However at that time, not knowing God, you were in bondage to those who by nature are not gods.

block.text: Әvvәllәr Allahı tanımadığınız vaxt tәbiәtcә allah olmayanların kölәlәri idiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You have come to know God, or rather to be known by God. Why do you turn back again to the weak and miserable elemental principles, to which you desire to be in bondage all over again?

block.text: İndi isә siz Allahı tanıdınız, daha doğrusu, Allah tәrәfindәn tanındınız. Necә olur ki, tәkrarәn zәif vә dәyәrsiz olan ibtidai tәlimlәrә qayıdırsınız? Yenidәn onların kölәsimi olmaq istәyirsiniz?

ReferenceBlocks.text: You observe days, months, seasons, and years.

block.text: Xüsusi günlәrә, aylara, mövsümlәrә vә illәrә riayәt edirsiniz!

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am afraid for you, that I might have wasted my labor for you.

block.text: Sizin üçün qorxuram, bәlkә sizә görә boş yerә zәhmәt çәkmişәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I beg you, brothers, become as I am, for I also have become as you are. You did me no wrong.

block.text: Qardaşlar, sizә yalvarıram, mәnim kimi olun, çünki mәn dә sizin kimi oldum. Siz mәnә heç bir haqsızlıq etmәmisiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You know that because of weakness of the flesh I preached the Good News to you the first time.

block.text: Bildiyiniz kimi mәn Müjdәni ilk dәfә sizә cismәn zәif olaraq vәz etmişdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That which was a temptation to you in my flesh, you didn't despise nor reject; but you received me as an angel of God, even as Christ Jesus.

block.text: Cismani vәziyyәtim sizin üçün çәtin bir sınaq oldusa da, nә mәnә xor baxdınız, nә dә mәni rәdd etdiniz. Hәtta mәni, Allahın bir mәlәyini, Mәsih İsanı qәbul edәr kimi qәbul etdiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What was the blessing you enjoyed? For I testify to you that, if possible, you would have plucked out your eyes and given them to me.

block.text: İndi o xoşbәxtliyiniz necә oldu? Sizin haqqınızda şәhadәt edirәm ki, әgәr mümkün olsaydı, gözlәrinizi çıxardıb mәnә verәrdiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

block.text: Mәgәr sizә hәqiqәti söylәdiyim üçün sizin düşmәniniz oldum?

ReferenceBlocks.text: They zealously seek you in no good way. No, they desire to alienate you, that you may seek them.

block.text: Onlar sizin qeyrәtinizi çәkirlәr, amma yaxşı niyyәtlә deyil. Siz onların qeyrәtini çәkәsiniz deyә sizi mәndәn ayırmaq istәyirlәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But it is always good to be zealous in a good cause, and not only when I am present with you.

block.text: Yaxşı niyyәtlә olarsa, qeyrәtimi çәkmәniz yaxşıdır, amma bu, yalnız yanınızda olduğum vaxt deyil, daimi olsun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: My little children, I am again in travail until Christ is formed in you.

block.text: Övladlarım! Mәsihin surәti sizdә yaradılana qәdәr, sizlәr üçün yenә doğuş ağrısı çәkirәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I could wish to be present with you now, and to change my tone, for I am perplexed about you.

block.text: İndi yanınızda olmaq vә sәsimi dәyişdirmәk istәyirdim. Bu halınıza çaşıb-qalmışam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Tell me, you that desire to be under the law, don't you listen to the law?

block.text: Ey Qanun altında yaşamaq istәyәnlәr, mәnә deyin görüm, Qanunun nә dediyini eşitmәmisinizmi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it is written that Abraham had two sons, one by the handmaid, and one by the free woman.

block.text: İbrahimin iki oğlu olduğu yazılmışdır. Bir oğlu cariyәdәn, o biri oğlu isә azad qadından doğulmuşdu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However, the son by the handmaid was born according to the flesh, but the son by the free woman was born through promise.

block.text: Cariyәdәn doğulan bәşәri arzusundan, azad qadından doğulan isә vәdә görә doğulmuşdu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These things contain an allegory, for these are two covenants. One is from Mount Sinai, bearing children to bondage, which is Hagar.

block.text: Burada bir mәcaz var. Çünki bu qadınlar iki Әhdi tәmsil edir. Biri Sina dağındandır, kölәlik üçün uşaq doğur. Bu, Hәcәrdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this Hagar is Mount Sinai in Arabia, and answers to the Jerusalem that exists now, for she is in bondage with her children.

block.text: Hәcәr Әrәbistandakı Sina dağını tәmsil edir vә indiki Yerusәlimә bәnzәyir. Çünki indiki Yerusәlim övladları ilә birlikdә kölәlikdәdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Jerusalem that is above is free, which is the mother of us all.
For it is written,

block.text: Sәmavi Yerusәlim isә azaddır, o bizim anamızdır.
Çünki yazılıb:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rejoice, you barren who don't bear. Break forth and shout, you that don't travail. For more are the children of the desolate than of her who has a husband.”

block.text: <<Şәnlәn, ey sonsuz, qısır qadın! Sevinclә mahnı oxu, qışqır, Ey doğuş ağrısı çәkmәyәn qadın! Çünki atılmış qadının övladları Әrli qadının övladlarından çoxdur>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now we, brothers, as Isaac was, are children of promise.

block.text: Sizsә, qardaşlar, İshaq kimi vәdә görә doğulan övladlarsınız.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But as then, he who was born according to the flesh persecuted him who was born according to the Spirit, so also it is now.

block.text: Amma o zaman bәşәr arzusundan doğulan şәxs Ruhun gücü ilә doğulan şәxsi necә tәqib etdisә, indi dә belәdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However what does the Scripture say?

block.text: Bәs Müqәddәs Yazı nә deyir?

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Throw out the handmaid and her son, for the son of the handmaid will not inherit with the son of the free woman.”

block.text: <<Cariyәni vә onun oğlunu qov. Çünki cariyәnin oğlu azad qadının oğlu ilә birgә varis olmayacaq>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, brothers, we are not children of a handmaid, but of the free woman.

block.text: Buna görә, qardaşlar, biz cariyәnin deyil, azad qadının övladlarıyıq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS CHP 5
Stand firm therefore in the liberty by which Christ has made us free, and don't be entangled again with a yoke of bondage.

block.text: Mәsih azad olmağımız üçün bizi azad etdi. Ona görә dә möhkәm durun vә yenidәn kölәlik boyunduruğuna tabe olmayın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, I, Paul, tell you that if you receive circumcision, Christ will profit you nothing.

block.text: Budur, mәn Paul sizә deyirәm: әgәr siz sünnәt olunsanız, Mәsih sizә heç bir fayda vermәz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, I testify again to every man who receives circumcision, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.

block.text: Sünnәt olunan hәr adama yenә şәhadәt edirәm ki, elә bir adam bütün Qanuna әmәl etmәyә borcludur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Christ has become of no effect to you, you who desire to be justified by the law. You have fallen away from grace.

block.text: Ey Qanun vasitәsilә saleh sayılmaq istәyәnlәr, siz Mәsihdәn ayrıldınız, Allahın lütfündәn uzaq düşdünüz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we, through the Spirit, by faith wait for the hope of righteousness.

block.text: Amma biz Ruh vasitәsilә imanla saleh sayılacağımıza ümid bağlayıb onu hәvәslә gözlәyirik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision amounts to anything, nor uncircumcision, but faith working through love.

block.text: Mәsih İsada әhәmiyyәt kәsb edәn sünnәtlilik yaxud sünnәtsizlik deyil, mәhәbbәtlә fәal olan imandır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You were running well! Who interfered with you that you should not obey the truth?

block.text: Yaxşı irәlilәyirdiniz. Axı hәqiqәtә itaәt etmә yolunuzu kim kәsdi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: This persuasion is not from him who calls you.

block.text: Belә inandırılmanız sizi Çağıranın istәyi deyil.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A little yeast grows through the whole lump.

block.text: Azacıq maya bütün xәmiri acıdır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have confidence toward you in the Lord that you will think no other way. But he who troubles you will bear his judgment, whoever he is.

block.text: Mәn Rәbdә sizә etimad edirәm ki, başqa cür düşünmәyәsiniz. Sizi lәrzәyә salansa, kim olursa olsun, öz cәzasını çәkәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I, brothers, if I still preach circumcision, why am I still persecuted? Then the stumbling block of the cross has been removed.

block.text: Amma, qardaşlar, әgәr mәn hәlә dә sünnәti vәz edirәmsә, nә üçün hәlә dә tәqibә mәruz qalıram? Elә olsaydı, onlara büdrәmә daşı olan çarmıx lәğv olunardı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I wish that those who disturb you would cut themselves off.

block.text: Ah, kaş sizi çaşdıranlar özlәrini axtalayaydılar!

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you, brothers, were called for freedom. Only don't use your freedom for gain to the flesh, but through love be servants to one another.

block.text: Qardaşlar, siz azadlığa dәvәt olunmusunuz. Ancaq bu azadlığı cismani tәbiәt üçün fürsәtә çevirmәyin, amma bir-birinizә mәhәbbәtlә qulluq edin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the whole law is fulfilled in one word, in this:

block.text: Bütün Qanun tәk bir sözdә tamamlanır:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You shall love your neighbor as yourself.”

block.text: <<Qonşunu özün kimi sev>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if you bite and devour one another, be careful that you don't consume one another.

block.text: Әgәr siz bir-birinizi didib-yeyirsinizsә, ehtiyatlı olun ki, bir-birinizi tәlәf etmәyәsiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you won't fulfill the lust of the flesh.

block.text: Mәn bunu deyirәm: Müqәddәs Ruha görә hәyat sürün, o zaman siz cismani tәbiәtin ehtirasını әsla icra etmәzsiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the flesh lusts against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh. These are contrary to one another, that you may not do the things that you desire.

block.text: Çünki cismani tәbiәt Ruha zidd vә Ruh cismani tәbiәtә zidd olanı arzulayır. Onlar bir-birinә qarşı durur ki, siz istәdiyinizi etmәyәsiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if you are led by the Spirit, you are not under the law.

block.text: Amma Müqәddәs Ruhun rәhbәrliyi altında olsanız, siz Qanun altında deyilsiniz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the works of the flesh are obvious, which are: adultery, sexual immorality, uncleanness, lustfulness,

block.text: Cismani tәbiәtin әmәllәri isә bәllidir. Bunlar cinsi әxlaqsızlıq, murdarlıq, pozğunluq,

ReferenceBlocks.text: idolatry, sorcery, hatred, strife, jealousies, outbursts of anger, rivalries, divisions, heresies,

block.text: bütpәrәstlik, sehrbazlıq, düşmәnçilik, münaqişә, qısqanclıq, hiddәt, özünü göstәrmә, nifaq, tәfriqәlәr,

ReferenceBlocks.text: envyings, murders, drunkenness, orgies, and things like these; of which I forewarn you, even as I also forewarned you, that those who practice such things will not inherit the Kingdom of God.

block.text: paxıllıq, sәrxoşluq, eyş-işrәt vә buna bәnzәr şeylәrdir. Sizә әvvәllәr xәbәrdarlıq etdiyim kimi indi dә xәbәrdarlıq edirәm ki, bunları edәnlәr Allahın Padşahlığını irs almayacaqlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faith,

block.text: Müqәddәs Ruhun sәmәrәsi isә budur: mәhәbbәt, sevinc, sülh, sәbir, xeyirxahlıq, yaxşılıq, sәdaqәt,

ReferenceBlocks.text: gentleness, and self-control. Against such things there is no law.

block.text: hәlimlik, nәfsә hakim olmaq. Bu kimi şeylәrә qarşı qanun yoxdur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who belong to Christ have crucified the flesh with its passions and lusts.

block.text: Mәsih İsaya mәxsus olanlar isә öz hәvәs vә ehtirasları ilә birlikdә cismani tәbiәti çarmıxa çәkdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If we live by the Spirit, let's also walk by the Spirit.

block.text: Madam ki, biz Ruha görә yaşayırıq, Ruha görә dә rәftar edәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let's not become conceited, provoking one another, and envying one another.

block.text: Şöhrәtpәrәst olmayaq, bir-birimizi hirslәndirmәyәk, bir-birimizә paxıllıq etmәyәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS CHP 6
Brothers, even if a man is caught in some fault, you who are spiritual must restore such a one in a spirit of gentleness; looking to yourself so that you also aren't tempted.

block.text: Qardaşlar, әgәr bir adam bir tәqsir üstündә tutulsa, siz ruhanilәr onu hәlimlik ruhu ilә bәrpa edin. Sәn dә sınağa düşmәmәk üçün özünә fikir ver.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Bear one another's burdens, and so fulfill the law of Christ.

block.text: Bir-birinizin yüklәrini daşıyın vә bu yolla Mәsihin qanununu icra edin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if a man thinks himself to be something when he is nothing, he deceives himself.

block.text: Çünki әgәr kimsә heç olduğu halda özünü әhәmiyyәtli sanırsa, öz-özünü aldadır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But let each man test his own work, and then he will take pride in himself and not in his neighbor.

block.text: Qoy hәr kәs öz әmәlini yoxlasın vә onda başqasının etdiklәri ilә deyil, yalnız öz etdiklәri ilә fәxr edәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For each man will bear his own burden.

block.text: Çünki hәr kәs öz üzәrinә düşәn yükü daşımalıdır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But let him who is taught in the word share all good things with him who teaches.

block.text: Kәlam haqqında tәlim alan, tәlim verәnlә hәr cür nemәti bölüşdürsün.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't be deceived. God is not mocked, for whatever a man sows, that he will also reap.

block.text: Aldanmayın: Allaha istehza edilmәz. Çünki insan nәyi әkәrsә, onu da biçәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he who sows to his own flesh will from the flesh reap corruption. But he who sows to the Spirit will from the Spirit reap eternal life.

block.text: Öz cismani tәbiәti üçün әkәn, bu tәbiәtdәn mәhv biçәcәk. Ruh üçün әkәnsә Ruhdan әbәdi hәyat biçәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let us not be weary in doing good, for we will reap in due season, if we don't give up.

block.text: Yaxşılıq edәrkәn ruhdan düşmәyәk. Çünki әgәr hәvәsdәn düşmәsәk, vaxtında biçәrik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, as we have opportunity, let's do what is good toward all men, and especially toward those who are of the household of the faith.

block.text: Buna görә dә nә qәdәr fürsәtimiz varsa, hamı üçün, xüsusәn imanlılar ailәsi üçün yaxşı işlәr görәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: See with what large letters I write to you with my own hand.

block.text: Baxın, sizә öz әlimlә necә böyük hәrflәrlә yazdım!

ReferenceBlocks.text: As many as desire to look good in the flesh, they compel you to be circumcised; only that they may not be persecuted for the cross of Christ.

block.text: Zahirәn vә cismәn yaxşı tәsir buraxmaq istәyәnlәr yalnız Mәsihin çarmıxı üzündәn tәqib olunmamaq üçün sizi sünnәt olunmağa mәcbur edirlәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For even they who receive circumcision don't keep the law themselves, but they desire to have you circumcised, that they may boast in your flesh.

block.text: Axı sünnәt olunanların özlәri dә Qanuna riayәt etmirlәr. Lakin sizin sünnәt olunmanızı istәyirlәr ki, sizin cisminizlә öyünsünlәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But far be it from me to boast, except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which the world has been crucified to me, and I to the world.

block.text: Mәnsә Rәbbimiz İsa Mәsihin çarmıxından başqa şeylә әsla öyünmәrәm. Bunun vasitәsilә dünya mәnim üçün çarmıxa çәkildi, mәn dә dünya üçün çarmıxa çәkildim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in Christ Jesus neither is circumcision anything, nor uncircumcision, but a new creation.

block.text: Çünki әhәmiyyәt kәsb edәn sünnәtlilik yaxud sünnәtsizlik deyil, yeni yaradılışdır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As many as walk by this rule, peace and mercy be on them, and on God's Israel.

block.text: Nә qәdәr bu qaydaya riayәt edәnlәr varsa, onların üzәrinә, Allahın İsraili üzәrinә sülh vә mәrhәmәt gәlsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From now on, let no one cause me any trouble, for I bear the marks of the Lord Jesus branded on my body.

block.text: Bundan sonra qoy heç kim mәnә әziyyәt vermәsin. Çünki mәn İsanın yara izlәrini bәdәnimdә daşıyıram.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brothers. Amen.

block.text: Qardaşlar, Rәbbimiz İsa Mәsihin lütfü ruhunuza yar olsun! Amin.
